Class Application

Object
Application
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISearchable
public class Application extends Object implements ISearchable
Represents a BTO application submitted by an applicant for a specific project and flat type. Stores the status of the application and its submission date, and supports filters for searching and reporting. Implements the ISearchable interface for dynamic filtering. Possible statuses:
  • PENDING
  • SUCCESSFUL
  • UNSUCCESSFUL
  • BOOKED
  • WITHDRAWN
Version:
1.0
Author:
Javier

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(Applicant applicant, Project project, String flatType)
      Creates a new application for the given applicant and project. Initializes the application date to the current date and status to PENDING.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant submitting the application.
      project - The project the application is for.
      flatType - The flat type applied for.

    • isBookable

      public boolean isBookable()
      Checks if the application is eligible to proceed to flat selection.
      Returns:
      True if the status is SUCCESSFUL.

    • isBooked

      public boolean isBooked()
      Checks if the application has successfully booked a flat.
      Returns:
      True if status is BOOKED.

    • isWithdrawalRequested

      public boolean isWithdrawalRequested()
      Checks if the applicant has requested to withdraw the application.
      Returns:
      True if withdrawal has been requested.

    • setWithdrawalRequested

      public void setWithdrawalRequested(boolean requested)
      Marks or unmarks the application as having a withdrawal request.
      Parameters:
      requested - True to mark as withdrawal requested.

    • matches

      public boolean matches(Filter filter)
      Checks whether this application matches a given filter.
      Specified by:
      matches in interface ISearchable
      Parameters:
      filter - The filter criteria to apply.
      Returns:
      True if the application satisfies all filter conditions; false otherwise.
